data.description: Perl extension for calculating simple moving
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I know of a half dozen people that actually use Math::Business::EMA
    and Math::Business::MACD. I'm just trying to add Math::Business::SMA
    and Math::Business::MACD.

    For some reason Math::Business::EMA was the only one ever added...

    The site where they were originally discussed has since vanished.
